translation: "why is there still no strict legislation on protecting personal data? ü§î i find it outrageous that companies and organizations still have free access to our personal information. #dataprotection #privacy #security"

in this post, i'm expressing my concern about the lack of strict laws regarding data privacy. i'm questioning why it's still possible for companies and organizations to have unfettered access to our personal information. i'm using the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsph√§re (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) to reach a wider audience and to connect my post with ongoing discussions about data privacy on twitter.
